reviewText: It's a great movie but shipping took nearly a month.

This may not be a well known feature but it is a really good flick.  The 3D is amazing and visuals are first class and inspired.  But it is the story that grabs you by the throat and doesn't let go.  The story spans so many generations resting in the wild west, the 20's, i believe, and then on Mars!  It has great characters and logical progression with some conspiracy thrown in for good measure.  I remember it being good but forgot just how good it was and it's even better in 3D!
Movie does not play at all its stuck in the beginning. I want to refund and send this back ASAP thank you
Took over 3 weeks for it to arrive but it is one of the best 3D movies I have in my collection.
Such a great movie to watch in 3D. Give us more 3D movies Hollywood!
